Pre-Game Insights: Analysts are predicting a close game between the New York Yankees and the Chicago Cubs.
The Yankees' recent form includes losing two out of three games to the Texas Rangers, but they won the opener against the Cubs with a 3-0 victory.
Clarke Schmidt will start for the Yankees with a season record of 5-3 and a 2.52 ERA in 11 starts.
Javier Assad will start for the Cubs with a season record of 7-4 and a 3.21 ERA in 25 starts.
The Yankees' bats need to take more initiative as they scored all their runs in the third inning in the previous game against the Cubs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be held at Wrigley Field and can be watched on MARQUEE and YES networks.
Betting odds favor the New York Yankees at -141, with the Chicago Cubs at +120.
